ValidationRule.description: Prevents loan from advancing to Doc Prep if Method of Doc Prep, Docs Needed By, and Projected Close Date fields are not filled in
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.No_Validation__c = false, ISPICKVAL(LLC_BI__Stage__c , 'Doc Prep'), OR( ISPICKVAL(cm_Method_of_Doc_Prep__c , ''), ISNULL(ffin_Docs_Needed_By__c), ISNULL(LLC_BI__CloseDate__c) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Method of Doc Prep, Docs Needed By, and Projected Close Date must be filled in before advancing the stage to Doc Prep
